name: Selling In A Skirt
tag_list: sales-training-company, sales-training-seminars, sales-and-marketing-training, best-sales-training-companies, sales-manager-training, professional-sales-training, sales-training-consultants
overview: Selling In A Skirt is a method, a philosophy and a way of life for the next generation of successful salesmen and saleswomen. Armed with over 30 years experience in the sales side of business, Judy Hoberman has observed and experienced such a wide variety of techniques come and go, sizzle instead of smolder, ultimately leaving adopters high and dry that she felt the need to step in and do something about it.
